name: birb (Glaas)
description:
Chirp ?

Gary wants that sweet, sweet ultimate upgrade in that shop. Only one way to get that : dig up all the trash that you can to resell it. The deeper it is, the better the junk.

So dig deep, and dig even deeper. Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare

Controls

A and D key to move left and right. (Arrow keys also work !)

Press the space bar repeatedly to fly.

Press the S key to start digging, and when you have found an item, mash that S key to dig it up ! (You don't need to actually mash. There's a cooldown.)

Beware that you can only dig while you're in a run. Why not explore a bit before you start ?

F.A.Q.
  •  Is the game infinite ? Can I gather points forever ?

No, it has an end ! How about you check out the shop ?

  •  I don't know what to do ?

Start a new run by interacting with the flag. Dig the ground, look at the distance, dig again, and do that until you find the right spot. Then DIG !

  •  How is that bird so handsome ?

 Oh, you noticed ? I heard he's single.

  •   Can you play my entry ?

 Sure thing ! Quickest way to contact me is just to reach out on Twitter. If you don't like the bird (how could you ?) there's always the rest at my LinkTree.

  •   Who worked on the game ?

 This is my creation from start to finish (hence the bugs and the mediocre jokes).

You can play the game in your browser, right now. It takes around 10 minutes to play.

Please consider leaving a rating ! Constructive criticism is encouraged, but please don't be too harsh, as this is only something that I did for fun and to challenge myself.

Alright, see you around !
